--- create_function_full.sql
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION my_schema.my_func(x INT64 DEFAULT 0) RETURNS INT64 NOT DETERMINISTIC LANGUAGE SQL SQL SECURITY INVOKER AS (x)
--- AST
&ast.CreateFunction{
  As:        130,
  RparenAs:  135,
  OrReplace: true,
  Name:      &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 27,
        NameEnd: 36,
        Name:    "my_schema",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 37,
        NameEnd: 44,
        Name:    "my_func",
      },
    },
  },
  Params: []*ast.FunctionParam{
    &ast.FunctionParam{
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 45,
        NameEnd: 46,
        Name:    "x",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 47,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      DefaultExpr: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 61,
        ValueEnd: 62,
        Base:     10,
        Value:    "0",
      },
    },
  },
  ReturnType: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
    NamePos: 72,
    Name:    "INT64",
  },
  SqlSecurity: "INVOKER",
  Determinism: "NOT DETERMINISTIC",
  Language:    "SQL",
  Definition:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 134,
    NameEnd: 135,
    Name:    "x",
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION my_schema.my_func (x INT64 DEFAULT 0) RETURNS INT64 NOT DETERMINISTIC LANGUAGE SQL SQL SECURITY INVOKER AS (x)
